"Peppy Rappy": "<%me>, are you there? Sorry for the sudden call."
"A large number of rappies have appeared all around Halpha, you see."
"Pleased to meet you. Your exploits have been the talk of towns the world over."
"Currently, there's a mysterious phenomenon occuring. That's why I've come to talk to you today."
"Pleased to meet you. Xitrae has told me of your many exploits."
"Would you be able to come see me for a moment? I'll be waiting."
